data_usage: Decadal average temperature anomalies (difference between the decade and the 1901-1960 average temperature) for the northern Great Plains region were plotted as a bar graph. Note: the far right bar contains data for 12 years (2001-2012).
methodology: Annual mean temperatures were averaged for all gridpoints in the northern Great Plains region. Decadal averages were then calculated. Finally the 1901-1960 average temperature was subtracted from the decadal average temperature.
notes: IDL was used to perform numerical calculations and to visualize the data.
output_artifacts:
temp_precip_seasonal_averages.pro
great_plains_north.ave.tave
temp_precip_decadal_averages.pro
GP_north.dec_avg.temp_ANN.txt
temp_precip_decadal_barchart.pro
GP_north_temp_anom_1901-2012_ANN.eps
